name: The Lion King V: Timon & Pumbaa
description: The Lion King V: Timon & Pumbaa is a game released on the Famicom by Dragon Co. as a sequel to their first ever release, The Lion King III: Timon & Pumbaa.

name: Lion King II
description:
Lion King II is an unlicensed platformer for the Sega Mega Drive. It is loosely based on the 1994 film The Lion King (as opposed to its 1998 sequel which shares the Lion King II title). It was developed by Gamtec at an unknown date, and uses sound effects from other unlicensed Mega Drive games. For example, the sound for Simba slashing enemies is the select sound from Rockman X3, and the sound when picking up an item is from Squirrel King.

A sequel, Lion King 3, was developed later on, and is also loosely based on the first movie.

name: Mulan
description: Mulan is a game for the Sega Mega Drive based on the Disney film of the same name, released in 1998. It was likely developed by ex-Chuanpu developers and published by X Boy. A second release exists that does not credit X Boy but it is unknown if it was published by another company or by X Boy without their logo.

name: Pro Games Player
description:
A Plug & Play console with a built-in NES-analog chip (famiclone), which comes with a 72 in 1 multicart with unlicensed NES games, and also with the following 51 games, made for famiclones, built-in:

Hitting Mices
Exist
Cute Fish
Corr Idor
M_Day
Danger Zone - (misspelt "Denger Zone")
Water Fire
Xmas Gift (hack of Mad Xmas)
Edacity Snakes
Pop Monster
Trooper
Robot
Archer
Aether Fighter
Final Man
Shooting Balloons - (misspelt "Shooting Ballons")
Santa Claus
Brave Boy
Magical Kitchen
Boxes World
Radish Field
Lawn Purge
Stub Game
Germ Killer
Way Out
Xtreme Robot (hack of Super Contra 7)
Boxing Wrestle - (misspelt "Boxing Werstle")

Diamond

Horrible Area
Table Tennis
Star
Highway Racing
Triple
Baseball
Access Block
Heli Mission
Twin Cards
Play Dice
Corridor
Maze Puzzle
Cat Vs. Dog

name: Observo
description: Observo is a short third-person survival horror game styled after early-2000s game classics, with a focus on atmosphere, puzzle-solving, and light combat.

name: Ring War
description: Become your own bullet hell in Ring War! The online PvP top-down shooter where you can instantly join a lobby with up to 15 other players, scavenge a loadout from a pool of over 250 unique items, and battle to the top of the leaderboard.

name: Rabbitoad
description: A frog-like rabbit is the main character's high-difficulty 2D action In order to fulfill the wish that "I will not be mistaken for a frog" Aim for the place of the goddess.

name: Ragedanger Earth
description: Ragedanger Earth - Demons and evil spirits have rebelled! Grab your gun and take out the vicious creatures in this roguelike first-person shooter!

name: Mortal Vessel
description: A dungeon crawler turn-based RPG where you play a hero that has the ability to possess creatures. Featured more than 10 creatures, each of them have a unique skill and ability, Including upgradable skills, ultimate skills, and combine with other skills.

name: Mayor T-Rex
description: Major T-Rex and his gang are back in town. A new apocalypse is coming because the nature can no longer support humans and their constructions.

name: Don't Get Tagged
description: Escape the Bobber occupied levels by doing puzzles and strategic movement through levels. Experience a variety of levels and challenges through out your play through, overcoming obstacles and those that block your path completely. Just don't get tagged In the processes.

name: Grot Slasher
description: Upgrade your character and try to survive in an endless maze filled with scary creatures. Smash all the items on the level so that the souls that have been hiding there for several hundred years get out of them, and move further along the dungeon.

name: King Pig
description: "King Pig" is an old-school top down arcade game. Your main goal is to save pigs from butchers. Be careful, butchers` saws must not hurt the pigs - dodge the saw with your heavy-duty cloak and kill all butchers!

name: Tower of Spirit
description: Tower of Spirit is a fast turn-based RPG where your choices matter. Gather a group of unique characters, survive a serie of random encounters and battle your way to reach the enigmatic tower!

name: Hiboka
description: Hiboka, a single player survival horror video game based on folklore from Madagascar and set around the middle of the 20th century.

name: Conditus
description: Show your friends who's the strongest ninja, and make them suffer. Or team up with them to eliminate your enemies.

name: Spellslinger VR
description: In Spellslinger VR you will run into a variety of monsters, puzzles, and challenges you must overcome by casting a wide array of elementally-aligned spells. The core gameplay comes from its unique spellcasting system, where stringing together specific arm and hand movements casts spells.

name: Hallowlands
description: Hallowlands is an open world procedurally generated RPG adventure. Explore a world full of monsters, harvest resources, and craft unique items. An adventure awaits!

name: The Katydids Incident
description: There is a big discussion going on about a mysterious group named The Katydids proposing riddles and challenges on online forums, Are you clever enough to unravel the mystery of this obscure organization?

name: June
description: June is a modern fable, presented in the form of an exploration-based puzzle platformer. It’s an emotional experience designed with a humanistic approach, that looks at the hero’s journey as an internal struggle between the individual and the collective.

name: Tales of Fire
description: Tales of Fire is a short story-driven game, embark on an adventure to bring fire to your ant village or else they all die to the cold winter breeze. Platform your way through mushrooms, escape from evil spiders and make friends along the way. Can you save them?

name: We Took That Trip
description: A chill narrative experience through procedural and relaxing landscapes. Appreciate the reunion with your best friends, explore the road and it's fantastic things. Turn the radio on, it's time to enjoy this emotional ride.

name: Kitten Hero
description: Help the kitten rescue his human and other kittens from a spaceship controlled by an alien AI (artificial intelligence).

name: SuperDuck!
description: Explore levels, create paths for the ducklings to reach the exit and save them from being stranded in this puzzle platformer.

name: Banana Drama
description: Banana Drama is an independent early access RTS game offering a single player and multiplayer experience. Your monkey king is held captive by evil dinosaurs - he needs help!

name: Splat Cat
description: Play as an artist painting their way through self-discovery! In this puzzle platformer, you'll wield your brush to paint your own path and defeat your insecurities, doubts, and fears as an artist. Finally, defeat the personification of these insecurities in an epic boss battle and reveal the beautiful artwork you made along the way.

name: Hell Division
description:
Hell Division is a game from the 3rd person, which is a battle of combat drones.

Become a pilot of an armed military drone and plunge into adrenaline-fueled action set in a cyberpunk city divided between two ruthless corporations. The confrontation is inevitable, the question is – will you prevail?

name: Symbiosis
description: Magnolia is a witch who lives with her son in the forest but after a recent break-in, there's clearly more to this story to be told. A horror RPGmaker game where you're the witch trying to get these intruders out of your damn house.

name: The Wine Story
description: Become one of the biggest wine company in the world with this breathtaking story of young entrepreneur with small dream which comes through.

name: Card Shark: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Souldiers: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Souldiers - Deluxe Edition contains base game, the original soundtrack and the artbook.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Dressed to Skill Edition
description:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

The "Dressed to Skill" edition includes the base game as well as the following extra items: Reprobed: Skin Pack, Reprobed: Challenge Accepted DLC (post-launch release), Reprobed: Official Orchestral Score, Reprobed: Digital Art Book.

name: Yuzusoft Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Behind the Frame: The Finest Scenery - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Airport CEO: Vintage
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Clean Earth
description: Retro pixel hack'n slash action game to clean the mutated Earth. Strategically combine various weapons and drones in this roguelite with random artifacts and events. Find out the attack patterns of various mutant monsters!

name: My Candy Love: Alternate Life
description:
What if your last year at Anteros Academy happened differently? And what if your first love was still in Amoris?

My Candy Love: Alternate Life is the fourth ongoing season of My Candy Love, being a series of retellings of University Life, with individual stories and romances following Candy's relationships with Lysander, Kentin, and Armin respectively.

name: Ye Olde Cribbage Club: A Later Daters Game
description: Cozy up with your favorite Ye Olde residents with a cracking cribbage contest. What is cribbage? Only the best board and card game combo ever played, enjoyed by many a senior citizen and old soul.

name: 2 Cats & 1 Dog
description:
"2 Cats & 1 Dog" is a bundle including;
- Chubby Cat
- .Dog
- .Cat Milk

name: Car Racing Trials
description: What better way to try out the newest, high performance cars than to take them for a drive on a race track?

name: Pirates Jigsaw Puzzle for Kids & Toddlers
description: Dive into the fascinating world of pirates!

name: Ocean Animals Puzzle for Kids & Toddlers
description: The perfect game for little kids and babies! No language skills required! Preschool & learning with fun!

name: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator
description: Go to the horse farm and get ready for adventures, quests, fights with predators and the opportunity to create a whole herd of horses!

name: Bike Jump
description: Become a crazy bike stunt driver! How far can you jump?

name: The Minesweeper: Crew Bomber Expedition
description: The classic minesweeper for Nintendo Switch. Train your brain, increase your skill and, at the same time, have fun with this challenging logic puzzle.

name: Raft Life
description: Raft Life - Build, Farm, Protect and Expand Your Perfect Raft!

name: Striker Modes
description: Nothing can overcome the adventure through the air, I enjoy the challenge in different types of planes!!!

name: Horizon Midnight Sky Combat Aircraft: War Arena Flight Simulator 2022
description: In this game you will not be playing lightly, you will have to develop strategies, battle techniques, and skills to survive the air war.

name: Beach Boys: The Perfect Date
description: Lying is not the best way to win a boy's heart. So behave well and be sincere as well as quick in giving your answers.

name: Beach Girls: Don't Lie in Summer
description: Lying is not a good thing to do, especially in love. So behave well and be sincere as well as quick in giving your answers.

name: Puzzle Bundle: Inbento & Golf Peaks
Boxerpunk Stories
description: Boxerpunk Stories is a Story based 2D Pixel Art Game.

name: Super Hero Driving School
description: Drive unique super hero vehicles and perform stunts on multiple crazy tracks.

name: Nail Salon: Style and Makeup Bag
description: It's manicure time! Let your creativity and imagination run wild as you paint and design the most fantastic nails. Recreate your favourite styles!

name: Shishi: Timeless Prelude
description: Shishi : Timeless Prelude is a colorful dungeon role-playing game. As Elia, a young mage, you will explore the depths of a sacred sanctuary to complete your training to become an Oracle.

name: The Diabolical Trilogy
description:
"The Diabolical Trilogy" is a collection of 3 challenging old-school games including;

- Xenon Valkyrie+: A roguelite platformer with RPG elements for hardcore gamers.
- Riddled Corpses EX: Frenetic arcade style twin-stick shooter. Fight your way through hordes of enemies alone or with a friend!
- Demon's Tier+: Dungeon-RPG roguelike with arcade and adventure elements. Enter the dungeons of King Thosgar and destroy his demonic minions!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Kingdom Fighter
description: 1vs1 heated battle! Enjoy playing games with your opponent!

name: Mudness Offroad Car Simulator
description: Mountain adventure of offroad suv are showing more suvs in 4wd for off-road. 4 x 4 offroad is new off the road for best simulation game. Extreme offroad driving experience.

name: Dave the Diver
description: Dave the Diver is an action-adventure and management simulation game developed by Mintrocket. In the game, players control Dave, who spends his days diving into underwater environments to catch fish and gather resources, and his nights managing a sushi restaurant. The gameplay combines real-time underwater exploration and combat with restaurant management mechanics.

name: Demon Turf: Bundle
description: Demon Turf: The Demon World is inhabited by all kinds of nasties... Most of them lumped into gangs battling for dominion, each led by its own head honcho. Yet even these bad dudes are no match for the Demon King himself!

name: Mechanic Battle
description: Pimp up your ride and snatch the title of the best car mechanic during the Mechanic Battle Tournament!

name: Legend of Arcadieu Bundle
description:
The Legend of Arcadieu takes place in a mystical kingdom inside a video game. The story begins when you accidentally enter the game and become the great legendary hero. Now you need to find your way back home. With the help of a cute mage and a beautiful…

The bundle features both games, The Legend of Arcadieu and The Legend of Arcadieu 2.

name: Farm Together: Polar Pack
description: Farm Together: Polar Pack has all new flowers: Euphorbia (3 variants), new tree: Holly Tree. As well as a new building: Smoked Fish Stand, new decorations: Curling Stone, Curling Target, Wooden Hot Tub, Icy Path, Sled and even new items; fence: Slalom Gate new outfits with four different skins and new hairstyles.

name: NASCAR 98: Collector's Edition
description: This collector's edition celebrates the 50th anniversary of NASCAR. The game is completely identical to NASCAR 98, except that Darlington has been added to the list of tracks and the racing legend Richard Petty has been added to the driver's roster, along with the obvious cover art changes. The game also comes with a NASCAR 50th anniversary key chain.

name: Farm Together: Fantasy Pack
description: "Farm Together: Fantasy Pack" includes loads of new things from new crop: Parsley to the new building: Jam Cauldron. Descover the new flower: Hobbit Jade alongside the new animal: Griffin. Decorate with new fences: Fantasy Arch, Broken Fantasy Arch, Embellished Fantasy Arch and the new road: Rune Stones. Enjoy new farm decoration: Dragon Bust and add a little personalisation with the new outfit with four designs.

name: THE Bass Fishing
description: We've recreated rod and reel controls, the joy of fishing, with the Joy-Con! The realistic graphics make you feel like you're really there, letting you enjoy real bass fishing anytime, wherever you are! Don't worry if you're new to bass fishing, either!…

name: Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Online
description: The first expansion for Dragon Quest X Online, known as Version 2.

name: Dragon Quest X: Inishie no Ryuu no Denshou Online
description: The second expansion for Dragon Quest X Online, known as Version 3.

name: Ghostware: Arena of the Dead
description: Ghostware is a retro-fps combining the lore-heavy plot and exploration of adventure games with the fast action of '90s shooters. You and other ghosts have been trapped inside an arena FPS created by a wizard's unwillingness to overcome his nostalgia. Escape the past, shoot your way out.

name: AI Under Test
description: The fear of artificial intelligence is nothing new, but will it always be for the bad? Solve puzzles and follow the creator and creator's conversation during the testing phase, until the moment they are interrupted by external matters.

name: Spyer
description: Denny, a government spy, is assigned to investigate a remote area where there is supposed to be a terrorist group. Upon arriving at the scene, Denny comes across several armed individuals, and finds possibly the largest base of the terrorist group.

name: Maniacs
description: Sin descripción

name: PvNP
description: A classic Sokoban game but with a modern take. 50 levels to test your brain in a semi-open world.

name: Hide and Seek Scramble!
description: Three players. Two teams. One kidnapped bunny! Play as three different characters in this fast-paced, competitive multiplayer game.

name: Talking Kiteboards by Flexifoil
description: Talking Kiteboards is a 12-person multi-player animated kiteboarding racing game. You choose from a range of exciting characters and kites as well as kiteboards which have varying skill sets to compete in races against bots or other players. Collect and win gold coins to spend on customisation.

name: Pixelshire
description: Build the town of Pixelshire and grow your community in a unique RPG sandbox which mixes life sim elements with town building, exploration, and combat. Express yourself by planning the town to your liking, master trades, get to know your neighbours, and explore the continent of Arcadia.

name: Maze Runner
description: You start the game as a cyborg, lost in the world of the Maze. He will need to find and collect all the orbs that will unlock the door to his freedom. He will have fifteen minutes to do so, before he gets lost forever. Complete mazes as third-person shooter. Eliminated over 40 different enemies.

name: Jigoku Unko: Toripuru
description: Our character has a tantrum after eating spicy Adana Kebab. Then he finds himself in hell for some unknown reason. He is no longer human and is even more angry. By breaking all the obstacles in front of him, he tries to advance as far as he can without his anger killing him.

name: Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor
description: You are in a barbarian land. They are trying to kill you. The Queen demands you tame them. So what now? Escape into an exciting, open-ended story and cunning tactical combat. Epic, indie fantasy adventure. Freely explore a huge world, fight for fame and power, and shape the world as you choose.

name: Leave No One Behind: la Drang VR
description: Leave No One Behind is a tactical RTS war game. Experience the hardest battles fought during the Vietnam War in 1965 between the US Army and the Army of the Northern Vietnam for landing zones X-Ray and Albany and for Plei Me special forces camp with incredible level of immersion provided by VR.

name: Eternal Pinball RPG
description: Level up and equip your hero in this unique Pinball-RPG mashup. Beat everybody on the online leaderboards and unlock the dungeon table to find rare artifacts to complete your collection.

name: Recollection
description: A calm and atmospheric "walking'n'watching simulator" about the beauty of nature. Use your gaze and attention in diverse gameplay experiences: Connect the stars, watch the grass grow, fly with the birds and remember many more of the wonders surrounding us each day.

name: Slime Jumper Adventure
description: Slime Jumper Adventure is a 2D platformer game where you are tasked with guiding the main character through multiple different levels of creative obstacles that increase in difficulty the further you get.

name: Finity
description: Finity is an action-adventure-puzzle sidescroller with a unique 3D-depth aspect.

name: Shattered State
description:
A city in turmoil. A nation under threat - where only your decisions can prevent catastrophe.

From the BAFTA award winning creators of Until Dawn comes a new cinematic VR experience.

You assume the role of the Director of the National Intelligence Agency in the midst of a national crisis. Take control of the situation and make tough decisions that decide the fate of your colleagues, the population and ultimately the nation. Who will you save? Who will you trust?

name: A Bad Game of Football
description: Classic RTS and Football meet in this explosive 1v1 game. Control all your players at once or separately in stadiums full of dangers for your players to avoid. Tackle, foul, and baseball bat your way to victory, just don’t get spotted by the referee…

name: Fountains
description: Master high-skilled combat to uncover the secrets of an ancient, interconnected world.

name: Android Simulator
description: Android Simulator is a futuristic FPS game in which you take the role of an android who is in charge of a spaceship colony. Keep a firm hand on the flight route and manage the right water balance for plants, oxygen level, and spacecraft parameters to securely deliver the colonizers.

name: Road Defense: Outsiders
description: Protect vehicles on the road and survive! Road Defense: Outsiders is a game that combines elements of the 'roguelike' and 'tower defense' genres. Upgrade the towers and your own skills to be able to annihilate all the life around you!

name: Sinner 97
description: Sinner 97 is a first person PSX VHS psychological horror set in 1997, within the confines of a shadowy religious cult. Remain hidden and overcome problems in order to escape the Father's clutches.

name: Skeletons vs Nadia
description: Skeletons vs Nadia is a third person game with beautiful graphics! In this game you have to play as a naked girl Nadya, who needs to get out of the cursed forest. There are a lot of lustful skeletons in this forest who want to kill you!

name: Dream Catcher VR
description: Dream Catcher VR is a relaxing puzzle adventure in the soulful world of Nappia – the land of dreams. Meet characters from varied backgrounds and shape their dreams – search for hidden parts, mend fractured memories, clear your path, and bring colors to the surroundings.

name: Platformity
description: A 2D puzzle platformer that combines puzzle solving elements with speedrunning challenges. Game features multiple obstacles with ever increasing difficulty.

name: Regular Strategy Game
description: Regular Strategy Game is strategy puzzle game built around the idea of combining aspects from a board game and a turn based combat videogame. Will you be able to figure out the right moves to beat each challenge?

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Dominion Biosyn Expansion
description: The biggest DLC yet for Jurassic World Evolution 2 features a new campaign inspired by events from Jurassic World Dominion, including all-new prehistoric species, feathered dinosaurs, a new Chaos Theory scenario, and more.

name: Run4YourLight
description: Spirits of Run4YourLight need your help to accomplish their destiny. Join the fight and help your favorite spirit!

name: Logicality
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey on the island of dreams. Explore the open world and interesting places, while solving various puzzles that use environment.

name: Stream War
description: Stream War is a streaming-based game. Streamers can link their Twitch account to this game with one click. Viewers join this game by commands in twitch comments to spawn characters. Viewers can increase their in-game points and compete for rankings.

name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition
description: He's a plumber, she's a daddy's girl. Only you can get them together, or tear them apart! Plumbers have everything: Greed, sex, spirituality, white-knuckle chases, shameful propositions, a nun, humor, true love, jaded love, jealousy, taut action, comedy, a bad guy, a good guy, a hero, spine-tingling suspense, a hot babe, brazen bravado, a damsel in distress, and a Hollywood ending! Plays like a game... feels like a movie!

name: Deathwish Enforcers
description: It’s the 1970’s and crime is running rampant! Join the Deathwish Enforcers squad and take crime down a notch! One to four-player single screen cooperative action! Meet happy hookers, flashers and drug dealers! Invade porn shoots, satanic rituals and volcanic evil lairs! Stop the evil syndicate at all costs!

name: Golf Navigator Vol.1
description:
The Golf Navigator game series let's the player enjoy a golf simulation where the hallmarks are panoramic 360 degree views of the courses and an intuiative system which allows for proper impartation of power and english to the virtual golfer's swing.

The Vol.1 features 2 courses: Caledonian Golf Club & Sohbu County Club. At the beginning of the game the player can choose between a male or a female caracter, select one of the courses and in each course he can play stroke play, free play or view the course data.

name: Golf Navigator Vol.2
description:
The Golf Navigator game series let's the player enjoy a golf simulation where the hallmarks are panoramic 360 degree views of the courses and an intuiative system which allows for proper impartation of power and english to the virtual golfer's swing.

The Vol.2 features 2 courses: Kawagoe Country Club & Shizouka Country Hamaoka Course. At the beginning of the game the player can choose between a male or a female caracter, select one of the courses and in each course he can play stroke play, free play or view the course data.

name: Golf Navigator Vol.3
description:
The Golf Navigator game series let's the player enjoy a golf simulation where the hallmarks are panoramic 360 degree views of the courses and an intuiative system which allows for proper impartation of power and english to the virtual golfer's swing.

The Vol.3 features 2 courses: Rope Club & Taiheiyo Sherwood. At the beginning of the game the player can choose between a male or a female caracter, select one of the courses and in each course he can play stroke play, free play or view the course data.

name: Golf Navigator Vol.4
description:
The Golf Navigator game series let's the player enjoy a golf simulation where the hallmarks are panoramic 360 degree views of the courses and an intuiative system which allows for proper impartation of power and english to the virtual golfer's swing.

The Vol.4 features 2 courses: Taiheiyo Gotenba & Ishioka Golf Club. At the beginning of the game the player can choose between a male or a female caracter, select one of the courses and in each course he can play stroke play, free play or view the course data.

name: Project M
description:
Project M is an interactive movie style game with branching paths based on quick time events, choices made during gameplay or in cutscenes and items carried by the character. The game is still in development with third person shooter sections shown at GBC 2023.

It is being developed in Unreal Engine 5 by NCSoft working with scanned data for detailed environments and objects along with machine learning AI technologies used for NPC voices and facial movements.

name: Bill and Ted's Excellent Retro Collection
description: A blast from the past! Bill & Ted's Retro Collection includes Bill & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure and Bill & Ted's Excellent Gameboy Adventure A Bogus Journey!

name: A Boy and His Blob: Retro Collection
description:
The Blob is back in an exclusive collection with Limited Run Games. The Retro Collection includes the original NES A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia, and The Rescue of Princess Blobette, originally on Game Boy.
Discover Blob's amazing appetite for jellybeans, and the different transformations that occur with each favor. Learn to use these shapes to overcome even the most outrageous obstacles.

name: Rendering Ranger: R² [Rewind]
description: You are the Rendering Ranger, a special forces soldier who defending Earth from a devastating alien invasion through nine levels of action platforming as well as blisteringly fast horizontal shooter stages. Originally developed for Super Famicom by Manfred Trenz, creator of the Turrican series.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Construction Chaos
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Construction site themed tables with an emphasis on Drop & Stationary Targets.

name: Shackles of Ellswyn
description: You've fallen into a weird world where men don't belong and are hunted down to become slaves. Will you submit or escape?

name: Honey Select 2: Libido DX
description: The ultimate sex simulator is here! Honey Select 2: Libido Deluxe is a love letter to making love. Engage with high-quality, fully-customizable characters in every imaginable situation. From romantic candlelight sex to the most specific kinks, Honey Select is sure to satisfy you!

name: The Search for Fran 2
description: Welcome to Sans Fran City. You are here to search for Fran, again. While searching, You can also talk with people and go on quests, collect glorbs, drive cars, fly a drone, crash cars, try a "challenge" and much more!

name: Vampire Sweetie
description: Vampire Sweetie is a otome game by Sugar Beans.

name: Crush Them!
description: In the quiet and peaceful grassland, a group of uninvited guests suddenly came! They are ordered by Satan to raid the walls of God! You have been hired by the gods as a new warrior, sworn to live and die with the city wall! Now, follow the will of God and crush them with your fingers!

name: Our Dying World
description: A fully voice-acted RPG where your choices will determine the ending. Discover why magic is slowly fading from Elorant and see how many of your friends you can save by the end.

name: Starry Sky: in Winter
description: The fourth of the four Starry Sky games starring the characters from the drama CDs of the same name.

name: Spiritus
description: Albert and Rose investigate a manor with miscreants and broken souls. Stay together and survive the horror.

name: Aim God
description: A shooting simulator that maximize your aiming skills and speed up your reflexes.

name: Hero Realms
description: From the makers of Star Realms Deckbuilding Game, Hero Realms combines the fun of deckbuilding games with the interactivity of trading card game-style combat. The Star Realms Digital Deckbuilding Game has been downloaded over 1M times. Like the hugely popular Star Realms app, the Hero Realms Digital game provides cross-platform play with full gameplay. In Hero Realms Digital, gamers choose their class, battle, gain experience, and level up fantasy-themed characters on iOS, Android, and Steam. Gamers can also adventure through story-driven campaigns and play Pit Fight mode against the AI.

name: Jumanji: The Curse Returns - Winter Resort
description: Play Jumanji in the Winter Resort Map and banish jungle creatures in a snowy wonderland! Add two characters and tokens to your collection and face a whole new riddle!

name: Joyride
description: Joyride is a low-poly style racing game, You will drive your vehicle through roads with different scenery in different seasons, In this game, You can race with yourself, And even operate a drone to watch your driving process, Good luck

name: Albert and Puzzle Mansion
description: Albert's cat has been abducted! Enter the mansion and solve puzzles in order to find and rescue the cat!

name: Starry Sky: in Winter Portable
description: Port of Starry Sky: in Winter for PlayStation Portable.

name: Prize Fighter: Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Starry Sky: in Winter 3D
description: Starry Sky: in Winter 3D is a port of Starry Sky: in Winter for the 3DS.

name: Go! Go! Kokopolo Anniversary Collection
description: Get ready to return to the world's first Chase'em Up - in an all new sequel Go! Go! Kokopolo. Set across 80 brand new stages of pure arcade mayhem, help the hyperactive wildcat, kokopolo, and his insane buddies, track down a secret recipe for immortality by causing as much mischief as possible in this epic, action-packed caper.

name: Starry Sky: After Winter
description: Fandisc for the original Starry Sky: After Winter game.

name: Puzzles with Nature
description: In this game, you will find a huge variety of relaxing puzzles designed to train your brain. Start dragging the puzzle pieces to the right place until you form a whole picture.

name: Blade Bros Impact!
description: An action RPG with several essences from classic 16 and 32 bit era RPGs! Enjoy dynamic battles, scary bosses, get more powerful by gaining levels, getting swords, rods, bows, axes and so forth!

name: I've Seen Everything: Birds
description: This DLC contains questions for the "Birds" category.

name: The Dead Sea Scrolls Adventure
description: Play as Dr. Jerusalem Jones, an explorer set on finding out the history behind the 7 major Dead Sea Scrolls. Along the way, the player gets to meet a whole cast of characters and traverse across the deserts and caves near the Dead Sea and Bethlehem to learn about the history behind these relics.

name: Crazy Shark
description: You have to control a crazed shark that lives in the depths of the ocean. Declare war on all living things, but be careful, the military is hunting you! Eat vacationers, break yachts, wreck ships, destroying submarines and helicopters!

If you think you are smart then this is a place where you can challenge the power of your mind. In this game you can use boxes and ladders to climb and find solutions to puzzles by focusing and thinking.

name: Panzer Girls
description: This is a fast-paced shooting game with simple operation. Together with the students of the girls' chariot academy, we forged the last line of defense to stop the monsters attacking like a flood.

name: Lovely Moments: Dad and Daughter
description: Jigsaw puzzle with 6 images, about day life of family and fatherhood. Enjoy playing theses scenes in 5 levels of difficulty and play minigames to increase your experience.

name: Dejar Ir: A Pandemic Soulful Tale
description: An intimate and sentimental game where the story is told through different works of art that evoke what we felt during the pandemic, culminating with one of the most beautiful feelings. What will it be? An adventure filled with emotions we experienced during the pandemic.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Legendary Edition
description:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: Legendary Edition is a special edition of the game Marvel's Midnight Suns, developed by Firaxis Games and published by 2K Games. Released alongside the base game in December 2022, this edition includes the full game and the Season Pass.

Additionally, the Legendary Edition includes 23 Premium Skins available at launch.

name: Idle Galaxy
description: Relaxing idle clicker game with various gameplay features. Challenging enough for hardcore players but it also can be fully completed.

name: Revived Forest
description: A 2D platform game. The main goal is to collect all the seeds and save the offspring of the ents. Be careful - there are dangerous orcs and lumberjacks!

name: Achromatic
description: Achromatic is a first-person horror puzzle game — Walk around the carnival you have been tasked with repairing and uncover the darker secrets that lie within. Solve puzzles and avoid the carnival workers as you try to escape.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Enhanced Edition
description: The Enhanced Edition of Marvel's Midnight Suns includes the base game with new-gen optimizations.

name: Dungeon Liberator
description: Dungeon Liberator is a game where eight or two players face off in 1v1 rounds, with the goal to be the last player standing. Players need to compete with opponents for Minions and attack orders. Reaction speed will become as important as tactical ability.

name: L.O.L. Surprise! B.B.s Born to Travel
description: Fans around the world can't wait to unbox their own L.O.L. Surprise! doll - and you're about to make their dreams come true! Choose your character, collect fabulous L.O.L. Surprise! dolls full of glitter, diamonds and more, and team up with up to four friends!

name: Triangle Strategy: Tacticians's Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Starry Sky: After Winter Portable
description: Starry Sky: After Winter Portable is a port of Starry Sky: After Winter for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Starry Sky: Winter Stories
description: Starry Sky: Winter Stories is a bundle of both Starry Sky Winter games.

name: Kirby Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle but for Kirby songs.

Each Kirby Heardle is randomly chosen from Kirby's Soundtracks Library (Owned by HAL Laboratory)

Majority songs were chosen from mainline games, while the selective few are from sidegame titles.

name: Mega Man Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle but for MegaMan songs.

Each MegaMan Heardle is randomly chosen from MegaMan's discography.

name: Donkey Kong Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle for Donkey Kong music.

Each Donkey Kong Heardle is randomly chosen from Donkey Kong's discography.

name: Magic Wardrobe
description: Design and color historical clothes while learning about famous women by reading news profiles on famous women through time and diaries and writing your own. Girls will have fun on the traveling adventure to 12 historical periods in time.

name: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita he: Sayuri-hen
description: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita he: Sayuri-hen is a Strategy game, developed by MBA International and published by Sony Music Entertainment Incorporated, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Mario Heardle
description: A variation of Wordle dedicated to songs from throughout the entire Mario franchise.

name: Mario Heardle 2
description:
A 2nd Mario Heardle that ran concurrently with the first, featuring different songs.
It ended on May 14th, 2023.

name: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita he: Shirou-hen
description: Itsuka, Kasanariau Ashita e: Shirou-hen is a Strategy game, developed by MBA International and published by Sony Music Entertainment Incorporated, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Yoshi Heardle
description:
A variation of Wordle dedicated to songs from the Yoshi games.
It ended on August 14th, 2022.

name: Naroth
description: Travel to Naroth and discover its secrets. A single player 3D open world RPG.

name: Élan
description: Elan is a strategy visual novel, developed and published by Visco, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Super Mario Heardle
description:
A spinoff of Mario Heardle, which is focused only on the platformer titles, also known as the "Mainline" series.
It ended on December 31st, 2022.

name: Metroid Heardle
description:
A variation of Wordle dedicated to songs from the Metroid franchise.
It ended on September 27th, 2022.

name: Mario Party Heardle
description:
A very short-lived spinoff of Mario Heardle that was focused on the Mario Party series.
It ended on June 22nd, 2022.

name: Morbius Heardle
description: It is a clone of Sonic Heardle, a clone of Joywave Heardle (modeled on the original Heardle).

name: Di Gi Charat Fantasy Excellent
description: Di Gi Charat Fantasy Excellent is a port of Di Gi Charat Fantasy for PlayStation 2.

name: Dr. Rin ni Kiitemite! Koi no Happy Four Season
description: A dating sim where you get put in the shoes of Meirin and can go for four different boys.

name: To the Moon and Beyond
description: In this single player card based game, you get to manage and build up your own space program. Your goal is to build all 8 mission critical objectives to safely send humans to the Moon and establish a permanent Moon habitat. You do this by determining what research to fund on the space station and what projects you want to fund back on Earth. Conducting research on the space station can reduce the cost of some projects or give you the ability to fund others. Results from the projects you fund determine your budget for the next year and get you closer to building your very own custom Rocket, Space Suit, Lunar Space Station, Moon Habitat, and more. Everything you do affects the outcome of your eight part program. But beware, events can happen that can influence that outcome. Will you be able to complete all of your eight mission objectives in four short years?

name: Starswirl Academy
description: A visual novel demo based on ponies.

name: After He Was Gone
description: "After He Was Gone" is a Tactical RPG. NO level-up system. Character's skills and items will change the battle situation significantly. Collect the treasures and lead therianthropes from getting out from the world of board game. Don’t worry. If YOU don’t lose hope, we can rewind the time any time.

name: Freeway Fiasco
description: Freeway Fiasco is a time-bending puzzle game. Control one car at a time in the same timeline. Your choices can set off a ripple effect with surprising interactions - past, present and future.

name: Watch Your Back
description: You are some small-time journalists, exploited by your boss. When an abandoned Cold War-era shelter is discovered, your boss sends you there to do the story of a lifetime. Only you two will know what awaits you in there...

name: Atria
description: Fight and survive against Assault droids and Sirens in an attempt to defeat the corrupt conglomerate known as Koretech and save the galaxy.

name: GoVenture Entrepreneur
description: The most realistic small business startup and operations simulation ever!

name: L'Avancée du Désert
description: Sin descripción

name: Hell Green Blue
description: terrible creatures that are the guardians of the infernal color, destroy the guardians and save the world from the dominance of the red color!

name: Me Alone Reissue
description: Apocalypse on earth! Many people have turned into monsters that eat the survivors. Stay alive as long as possible! God bless you.

name: Lore
description: Lore is a stealth horror game about finding your missing grandfather while avoiding a mysterious man hunting you in the woods. Try to outsmart and avoid an adaptive AI and save your grandfather from wherever he is hiding.

name: Lord of Darkness: Prologue
description: Lord of Darkness: Prologue is a fantasy game made in pixel-based graphics, just like in the good old days of the early dawn of Japanese rpg. An epic adventure full of dangers and hardships awaits you.

name: Futsuma Shoujo Charlotte
description: Mizuki Konoe, also known as Exorcist Charlotte, lived among others using a disguise. Explore an abandoned factor and fight off the devils! Exorcist heroine RPG!!

name: Futanari Sex: Naughty Massage
description: A visual novel about a couple trying to release tension and increase their sexual pleasure. Not knowing where to start and eager to know all the secrets of erotic massage, they turn to a specialist.

name: Touhou Blooming Soul
description: A classic pixel side-scrolling action game with Rogue-lite. Play as Hata no Kokoro on a journey of self-discovery and use combinations of different emotions to fight battles as beautiful as a dance!

name: Touhou Fairy Knockout: One Fairy to Rule Them All
description: A game where multiple players co-fight or compete against each other! You will role-play as playful fairies with unique personalities, and accomplish your own Gekokujō in Gensokyo where the strong gather! Make your own favorite fairy character the strongest with your own hands!

name: Arafinn Kontor
description: The Arafinn Kontor is the central hub of the Arafinn Universe. Arafinn is a dark high-fantasy world full of epic tales and legends. Dwarves, elves, humans, giants, the orcish Uturi, and many other beings inhabiting a world in constant change, full of war, conflicts, and unexpected alliances.

name: Respawn
description: You're a clone of Kane Hartman. You woke up to take part in an AI driven experiment to find the source of the human will to survive. Fight your way through countless robotic opponents and break free from the maze!

name: Legend of Mortal
description: The game world is set in a turbulent state and the mighty Tang-Man declines. The threats from the old enemies keep coming one after another.As a nobody, will you choose either to leave yourself out of it or to fight for Tang-Man's future and turning the tide? The journey of yours,is unpredictable.

name: New Roots
description: In this story-driven pixel game set in a post-global warming world, a young capybara seeks to regrow the extinct native plants of their home with the help of their solarpunk community.

name: Alpha Pairs
description: Dr. Atoz is your host in this fun test of memory matching and spelling. Watch out for Alphy who is always hungry for letters.

name: Sentinel Attack
description: Sentinel Attack will have you play as both Justin and Erica in horizontal shooter and metroidvania stages as you battle in space and explore the many levels of the Sentinel station.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Legends of Mystery 5
description: An atmosphere of mystery and riddles is already waiting for you in the game "Mystical Legends". 500 amazing pictures of excellent quality will help you feel the world of mysticism.

name: 14 Minesweeper Variants
description: 14 Minesweeper Variants is... well, 14 minesweeper variants. What else would you expect? By the way, guessing is not required in this game.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Top Gun: Maverick Aircraft Set
description: It's finally happening... A special set in collaboration with the movie Top Gun: Maverick, featuring 6 aircraft (inc. originals), as well as nicknames and emblems. Prepare to pilot new aircraft and take your heroics to new heights!

name: 180 Seconds
description: In the period of 180 seconds you will analyze every object in your house... when the ambulance passes, the thunder, and the ringing of the phone. You live during the time of a pandemic and your mission is to use your real-world knowledge that you have learned about viruses. Would you be infected?

name: 2Pupp
description: This game features more than 30 levels that feature platforming challenges.

name: 3D Combat Zone
description: In this wireframe graphics FPS game, originally released for the ZX Spectrum in 1983, take on the role of a tank commander in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, struggling to survive against other tanks, deadly flying saucers, and the fearsome super tanks.

name: Accursed
description: Accursed is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a mysterious ever-changing house in a slow-paced, atmospheric world and survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

name: Adventures at the North Pole
description: Look for snow-covered tracks, collect evidence at the site of abandoned parking lots, communicate with Eskimo leaders and shamans, and find out what happened to the ship "Silent", its crew and captain.

name: Aierlon
description: Invoke the Gods as you navigate an Ancient Temple in this thrilling First Person Puzzle Platformer

name: Airdrift
description: Casual survival game where you build and fly your own airship, explore flying islands, craft tools, farm crops and more.

name: Aitta: Finnish folktales
description: Explore and experience the old, lost Finnish folk stories.

name: A Last Will and Testament
description: First-person horror game in an escape room style with nice graphics, inventory, story, voiceover and good price & gameplay. Solve puzzles, collect notes. Fulfill the last will and find a testament.

name: AI Dungeon
description: An AI-powered text-based RPG like you've never played before. Write stories, interact with realistic characters, and experience virtually infinite worlds and genres. Escape to alternate universes where you direct the action and anything is possible!

name: Swallow
description: Swallow is a first-person psychological horror game with a heavy focus on story and exploration. Based on a true story, describe an unsolved case that took place on an isolated island of 20th century England. Players take control of a lighthouse keeper to uncover the truth.

name: Lightworkers
description: A 2D Visual Nove Adventure.

name: Wonderful Waking World
description: A simplistic, dynamic Touhou fangame bullet hell shmup with a pixel art esthetic. Shoot down your enemies and dodge your way through an incessant barrage of projectiles!

name: Maid Cafe at Electric Street
description: This is a role-playing game about maid cafe, featuring the theme of love, adventure and simulation, set in the otaku haven of Nipponbashi, Osaka. Developed by Adventurer's Tavern, an indie game team from Shanghai, China.

name: Boku to Kare no Kiken na Doukyo Seikatsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Zaxterion: Space Frenzy!
description: Welcome to a high adrenaline arcade space game that offers very addictive and fast paced action! Zaxterion brings 80's old school goodness to modern times for the young and old alike!

name: At the Party
description: Play with friends in person or remotely! A collection of party games to break the ice, have a laugh, and hang out playing. Play on your phones, or on any device with a modern web browser. No need to stream to everyone who is playing!

name: Atomic Escape
description: Uncover a profound secret conspiracy solving puzzles and cracking codes to access the confidential files from a secret space travel project in this first person point and click adventure game set in a beautiful mid century atomic age ranch.

name: Armed Zone
description: Armed Zone is an intensive Third Person Cover Shooter game blended with team tactics and diverse gameplays. Experience the furious combat on ever-changing modern battlefields, you can play both Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes.

name: Arali
description: Fight your way through hordes of enemies, rescue the five forest spirits and bring them back to their tree, and lift the curse plaguing the Enchanted Forest!

name: Animal Sanctuary
description: Create a beautiful nature refuge for all kinds of animals to come and relax in. Give them enough food, water and some toys to play with and see if you can get all the animals to show up!

name: Alien Shooter 2: New Era
description: A desert, an abandoned city, cramped underground corridors of MAGMAs research centers, and for hundreds of kilometers around there is only darkness and thousands of monsters coming from all sides. You have only two options - to achieve your goal or die.

name: Wuscar
description: Wuscar is a thrilling FPS Multiplayer experience. Collect weapons, Upgrade your Robotic limbs and become the strongest Wuscar known to man.

name: Yomawari: Lost in the Dark
description: Another chapter of the atmospheric horror series has emerged from the shadows! Eerie sound design and shadowy environments set the stage for gruesome and terrifying ghosts never seen before in the series.

name: Yakiniku Simulatior
description: Simple and easy game! Just chill out and simulate eating yakiniku!

name: Yonesawara Hospital
description:
Yonesawara Hospital is a single-player exploration horror game from the first-person perspective.
The game focuses on the search for the abandoned hospital "Yonesawara Hospital", and by finding various clues, the truth about what happened at the hospital will be revealed.

name: Car Destroyer
description: Car Destroyer is a pixel racing arena that will make you fight in ruthless wastelands.

name: Byte Lynx
description: Byte Lynx is a sci-fi real-time strategy game with construction-based combat set in the X-736 solar system. Out-maneuver your opponent and make their base your own. Build powerful assault platforms to lay waste to fortified defenses.

name: Bus Driving Sim 22
description: Experience what it feels like to be a real bus driver. Featuring realistic physics, a variety of bus models, three distinct regions to explore (US, Germany, Brazil), authentic traffic and more. Test your skills in career mode, drive freely in freeride or play together with friends in multiplayer.

name: Burn Depth
description: Burn Depth is an underwater, exploration-focused horror game. Master a varied tool set, uncover the secrets of an underwater world, and survive an unwelcoming environment humanity was never meant to see.

name: Bunker 22
description: You are a geneticist who woke up in a forest house. Everyone you knew has turned into bloodthirsty zombies, the world is dying out and a secret experiment is to blame. The only way to prevent disaster is to go to an underground laboratory to create a cure and save those who are still alive

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Talvisota
description: The Talvisota expansion for CtA - GoH offers Finland and the unique northern fighting between 1939 and 1945, including a vast array of weaponry and unique game mechanics. The return of classic skirmishes also expands the Eastern Front with huge, replayable battles with a menacing, revamped AI.

name: Boom!
description: Oh no, you have lost your legs! Use your sci-fi gun to rocket jump your way up, but be careful; one wrong move and you might just fall right to where you started.

name: Bots Crusher Arena
description: Bot Crusher Arena is an open top-down shooter where the player takes on the role of a cyborg participating in an arena elimination with other cyborgs. The task is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies. Don't let the enemies hit you.

name: Boxman Adventures
description: Boxman Adventures is a fun platformer game about a friendly box-headed creature. Complete various levels in various different environments, including forests and deserts.

name: Brain Vomits Garden
description: Connect with friends or strangers to explore the vast realm of Brain Vomit. Paint, discover secrets, minigames, sidequests, and drippy apparel in a beautiful, massively multiplayer world.

name: BTank
description: BTank is a game in which you need to destroy balls with different properties using projectiles. By scoring points for destroying the balls, you can get extra lives.

name: Buccaneers: Shipshape
description: Beat-‘em-up action on the high seas! Slip into the role of one of four fearless pirates and hack-and-slash your way through waves of enemy hordes, offshore and on a dangerous island in the Caribbean!

name: Bug Dolls: Soviet Project
description: This is a horror game about a small town engulfed in dangerous dolls.

name: Bonfire Peaks: Lost Memories
description: Three chapters of DLC for this critically beloved puzzle game, each with new mechanics and new puzzles.

name: Babysitter Simulator
description: Babysitter Simulator is a casual game which prepares you for mature life! Your mission seems simple at first sight, but it is not so.

name: Bargue
description: Bargue is an online role-playing game with 12 people. You can be a good customer, a bad mafia, or a neutral thief. To survive each round, you must convince the opponent with voice chat. At the end of the day, the surviving team wins!

name: Bean Story
description: A horror strategy survivor with action and fast Movement Required game. You have a sword which you use to kill enemies and proceed with the story. The goal of the game is to find a way out, survive and find information about your disappearance The game is mostly a wave suvivor game with a story.

name: BioCrisis: Return 2 the Lab
description: The alert has been given, the virus is on the loose, you've escaped the lab, the city will be nuked!

name: Binary Run
description: The Reformat is inevitable. The Virus Spreads. Keep Running. Binary Run is a fast paced retro shooter inspired by 80s synthwave and retro shooters. Kill, collect and run your way through a corrupted digitial world, Keep Running.

name: Blastboard: Casso
description: Adds a character named ‘Casso’ into the game.

name: Biters & Bullets
description: Kill thousands of zombies, collect loot, and become a lean mean killing machine! Battle and survive hordes of monsters in this high octane casual game with rogue-lite elements. Defeat bosses, hot-wire cars and stack power-ups to infinity. How long will you survive?

name: Bionic Bay
description: An ordinary man in an extraordinary world. Bionic Bay is a new kind of a 2D platformer. It introduces a unique Swap mechanic, allowing players to interact with the physics-based world in new ways. The immersive gameplay is completed by spectacular environments and creative level design.

name: Blast Off Far Away
description: Shoot to move, move to live, live to shoot! Blast Off Far Away (B.O.F.A.) is a space-themed, top-down arena shooter, with a focus on fast-paced arcade-esque gameplay, with the unique twist where movement is limited through the use of the player's gun.

name: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom
description: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is an indie tower defense game, set in a pop-up sketch book. Players can place automated towers while controlling a character to defeat enemies and defend the king's statues.

name: Blitz Roads
description: Blitz Roads is a futuristic action-packed vehicle combat racing world. Compete in numerous racing tracks with 6 different ways to play. - And test your racing skill with “Challenge Mode”. Start your engines. Ready. Set. Let’s Play!

name: Blocky Dungeon
description: A weird mix of block-placing puzzle and roguelike, where you build a dungeon and explore it at the same time! Defeat enemies, clear lines and collect loot. Explore the different dungeons, complete quests and try to survive as long as you can!

name: Boltcraft
description: Enter an adventure with dynamic combat by choosing a class and specialization, where you can create hundreds of possible combinations of spells to face the enemies of the dungeon. Unlock passive skills for unique perks and gain more power with items you find on your journey.

name: Blazing War
description: The aggressive planets challenged the Earth to a martial arts contest, and each loser would give up a piece of land to the planet for a colony on the other side.Start the game fighting and wipe out all the team members of the other side to be considered the winner!

name: Whore Dealer
description: Whore Dealer is a puzzle game, you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures. The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand so that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute.

name: WipeOuters
description: A first-person horror game with action elements where you and your friends must "wipe" the houses finding all the infected in the area before they find you.

name: Withering Rooms
description: Withering Rooms is a 2.5D horror adventure set in a procedurally generated Victorian mansion that changes each night. Sneak through Mostyn House to gather weapons, distractions, magical artifacts, keys, and crafting materials.

name: Wolves on the Westwind: The Vampire of Havena
description: The Vampire of Havena is a analog solo adventure that you can play without a master or teammates. Take on the role of a stray who grew up and was born in Havena. Set the new challenges and use all your skills to survive!

name: What Is Love?: Vol. 1
description: What is Love you may ask... Love is a game. Pretty good one actually, full of pretty girls with dark secrets and everything you ever wanted. Love is in the air and you can breathe deeply. And do other stuff. Deeply. But have in mind that your actions matter so Baby, don't hurt me!

name: Wars Across the World: Curupayti 1866
description: This is the complete coverage of the 5 years of the Triple Alliance War opposing Paraguay to the coalition of Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay. e Paraguay strives to capture disputed territories, and then hold them against its powerful neighbours.

name: War Tanks
description: Control the tank and destroy all the enemies. Monitor the condition of the tank's armor and fuel. You can switch between three views: First-person camera, third-person and top view. Minimal interface and understandable for any language.

name: Vicious Growth
description: Action RPG Roguelike. Evolve your abilities and push yourself through a procedurally generated level. Think hard about your choices, itemize well and use your skills to reach the end.

name: Unpetrified
description: Play as a sweet, curious stone creature, experience different emotions and see, hear, and feel how the world changes around you. Explore a world filled with flora and fauna, where you interact with your surroundings in unique ways in this single-player narrative adventure.

name: Veggie Menace
description: After a failed spell during a vegetable contest in the Middle Ages, the vegetables come to life and try to invade the civilization. A little witch with her magic powers will need to fight against this invasion.

name: Click Lovers
description: Make full use of your fingers to interact with beautiful girls in various ways~

name: City of Gangsters: Shadow Government
description: Control city politicians and manipulate laws in New York and beyond, in the new expansion pack City of Gangsters: Shadow Government.

name: Chronescher
description: Chronescher is a challenging turn-based puzzle game in Escher-esque spaces. Use impossible geometries, teleportation and environmental snapshots to navigate your mind and uncover your lost memories.

name: Chess vs. Chat
description: Allow your chatters to actively participate and engage with your chess stream simply by typing the moves they would like to see in the chat. :) All without the use of 3th party applications. Includes a highscore, match history, twitch emotes, twitch bot, auto moderating and tons of customization.

name: Chess Pills
description: You have to guess the right move, but you're running out of time. Use the orange pill to get sharp and focus on the right piece. Or use the turquoise pill to chill and slow the time. But beware, the abuse of substances can cause hallucinations, or worse, leave you in a coma or permanently insane.

name: Charmareians
description: Planet Charmara's situation grows more dire every passing day. Will the Misfits be able to stop the world from falling apart underneath them?

name: Chaos War
description: Sin descripción

name: Cato: Buttered Cat
description: Buttered cat paradox puzzle platformer game

name: Catastrophe
description: Catastrophe is survival horror dungeon crawler. Try not to get lost in the labyrinth as you choose to slay the dungeon's inhabitants or sneak past as many as you can.

name: Dorfs: Hammers for Hire
description: A co-op crafting platformer where your friends prove worse than any enemy. Craft weapons and armor from your dwarven workshop, help your patron's army win the battle, and make your way up the Iron Mountain!

name: Down Fast VR
description: Ride mountain bike at crazy speed in VR. Down Fast VR puts you behind the bars of a fast mountain bike beast. Go through technical, full of stunts and at high speed mountain trails. Use your controllers and headset to steer, lean, spin, flip and many more. Try to stay in control and be the fastest!

name: Do You Want More!?
description: Play as Lloyd Arch, the young private detective known for being total dick, and unravel the mystery of the Black Scar Serial Killer in this visual novel adventure, but remember that the truth tends to hurt the most.

name: Drago Noka
description: The surface has become overrun with giant beasts and destructive vermin, leaving an uninhabitable world in their quake. Humans had to get creative and now… they live on the backs of dragons! Gather various materials, create new items, and develop your very own village in Drago Noka!

name: Drunk Games
description: "Drunk Games" is a 2D top down shooter with Battle Royal elements. The player, surrounded by other characters, must collect as many bottles as possible, knocking them out of other drunkards!

name: Dungeonrite
description: Dungeonrite is a First Person Dungeon Crawler inspired by the classic RPG's of the 90's. Level up your characters and gear them with the best loot you can buy (or find) as you navigate your way through perilous dungeons filled with enemies and puzzles.

name: Echo's Climb
description: Echo's Climb is a challenging, 3D adventure platformer. You'll explore a kingdom frozen in stone, ascend the various locales and collect echoes of the past, all to hopefully return these lands to their former glory.

name: E-circle
description: Sin descripción

name: Eden Remains: Arrival
description: Eden Remains: Arrival is a Sci-fi First Person Action-Survival game. You play an elite dropship trooper sent to investigate a distress signal at a remote research facility on Eden. Fight, gather resources, manage vitals and craft supplies to stay alive.

name: ElvenEscape
description: Help Ann Varissa escape captivity from the demon in this stylized pixel 2D top-down shooting! Remember to keep a safe distance while killing demons with a variety of bows and weapons. Suffer the consequences of defeat with BDSM H-scenes and detailed CGs!

name: Enter the Cum
description: She lives alone on a space station. However, nothing prevents this fiery space adventurer from inviting some friends to a raunchy party full of explicit sex and pornography.

name: Dunkeep
description: Combat. Cooking. Crafting. This and so much more in Dunkeep, a casual RPG adventure game mixed with life-sim elements where at night you fight your way through endless dungeons collecting everything you need to run your very own tavern during the day.

name: Dominion: Prosperity - 1st Edition
description: Play with classic cards in this set that were included in the original release of Prosperity.

name: Dogs Cyberpuzzle
description: A jigsaw puzzle with videos of dogs in a cyberpunk atmosphere. Beat the clock and find out what Kitty's message is.

name: Dis Pontibus 2
description: A single-player game set in a archipelago full of puzzles.

name: Detective: The Mountain City
description: You are a detective who newly arrived in the mountain city, helping the local police to solve the crime. You need to be able to use your powers of deduction to find the killers and bring them to justice. Enjoy your trip to the mountain city.

name: Despectum Drakone
description: Despectum Drakone is a turn-based RPG game about rejection and obsession. Equipment can be upgraded with Glyphs and bordures. Humans and agrestes can be recruited as allies during the adventure. The music and artwork are original, created exclusively for Despectum.

name: Desktop Hacker
description: A narrative driven hacking game that takes you on a journey around murky hacking circles. You will be using the console and graphical tools to hack systems in order to profit and advance the storyline.

name: Desert Things
description: Desert Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the desert location within a certain time.

name: Demon Sword: Incubus
description: Use sword and spell combos to slash and blast through hordes of attacking enemies! Guard break a bosses defenses, find an opening, then obliterate them for good with a well placed super deadly attack! Satisfying 3D side scrolling action with game-play elements inspired by fighting games!

name: Delegati Genesis
description: A cyberpunk fantasy RPG.

name: Defend the Bits TD
description: An awesome 3D tower defence game created to give you days and days of the most fun TD game in town. Defend from hordes of Blocks with your mighty BIT heroes! armed with bows, axes, cannons and even frying pans.

name: Deathsmiles I & II: Gothic wa Mahou Otome 5 Characters
description: Deathsmiles meets Gothic wa Mahou Otome

name: Dead by Daylight: Roots of Dread
description: When the dusk turns full dark, it comes. Dead by Daylight’s Roots of Dread Chapter features a new Killer – The Dredge – and a new Survivor, Haddie Kaur. A new map, the disturbing Garden of Joy, is available for all players.

name: Dancin Divas
description: A robbery has taken place! Four Diva's from around the world are showcasing their treasures at the local lounge but things have gone south. It's time to fight back!

name: Cyra and the Beacon Path
description: Join Cyra on an intergalactic mission to find her father in this challenging platformer. Journey through seven distinctive and captivating worlds, encounter diverse and quirky new lifeforms, and unravel the mystery of Dr. Kallis’ disappearance.

name: Cut to the Core
description: How much of someone can you cut away before there's nothing left? Find out in this chilling kinetic visual novel - IF YOU DARE!

name: Crusader Kings III: Fate of Iberia
description: The sun-kissed lands of Iberia await your glorious rule with Crusader Kings III: Fate of Iberia flavor pack. Deeply rich in history, culture and people, the peninsula’s medieval destiny is ready to be shaped by your majestic hand, be it clad in conciliatory velvet or as an iron fist.

name: Cryptorig
description: CryptoRIG is a semi-idle server management game focussed on cryptocurrency mining and trading.

name: Cube Decider
description: Cube Decider is a logic puzzle game with RPG elements where you need to make your way through each level collecting power-up and deciding whom and when to attack using your logic and arithmetic skills.

name: CubeShooter
description: this is a tower defence game, character cant move,but you can choose your weapon,and your evolution way and get special result ， randomn map, random weapon and random enemies; we add some roguelite elements and character can get permanent upgrade.

name: Cultist Astronaut
description: Blast through this cultic platformer as a space-faring cultist hellbent on purging the galaxy of heretics! Travel to hazardous planets across the cosmos and eliminate opposing cults with your eldritch blaster.

name: Collapse Relapse
description: Explore and collect upgrades before the timeloop resets! Collapse Relapse is a 2D platformer where you have to think and plan out your route in order to be able to escape in time, with secrets galore!

name: Iron Evil
description: A roguelite where you traverse a factory run by an evil corperation, equip yourself with the best of parts (that hardly have any defects!) and fight your way to the end. However the parts you don't equip the factory applies elsewhere...

name: Come Home.
description: Top down pixelated story about desperation and betrayal.

name: Command Line Mazer
description: Command Line Mazer is a casual strategy game using Unix-like command-line interface. You will command virus to gather resources while avoiding being caught by anti-virus.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 08
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 8: Dead Poet's Propriety! Pizza Boi is a newly ascended Cool Kid. Time to shove it in everyone’s face and get the respect he’s always dreamed of!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 09
description: Episode 9: Freaky Cryday! School Kid Cody is a newly descended Loser. He’d better get his cool back if G-Ma’s gonna let him back in the house!

name: Coral Cove
description: Coral Cove is a relaxing match 3-like underwater game in which you try to build the largest reef without running out of corals to place.

name: Crazyness: Weird Village
description: First-person action game

name: Cowboy Girl
description: In the Wild West, very terrible and foreign monsters have been found up with which you, as the young Cowboy Girl, who recently bought her first revolver, has to fight with them!

name: Covid Killer
description: Covid killer is a FPS-Survival game in real time (3D UE4) in first person. You will have to face hordes of aggressive viruses that you will have to eradicate thanks to the vaccine darts contained in your rifle and make the best scores.

name: Entropic Float
description: A free drama-mystery visual novel with a modern fantasy setting. Reach out to the fourteen people trapped inside to find the truth through eighteen endings, influenced by but not exclusively bound to your own system time.

name: Escape Abstraction
description: Escape Abstraction lets you (re)discover 7 abstract paintings in a first person puzzle game. Recompose the painting to escape!

name: Escape the Ether
description: Struggle your way through a gauntlet of 100 intense tests of platforming skills, in this ultimate love letter to the genre. And all this with the use of one hand? Simple to play, impossible to master.

name: Estranged: Arctic Cold
description: Estranged: Arctic Cold follows the story of a fisherman stranded in a mysterious Arctic facility. Experience the rich environments as you venture deeper, and uncover the secrets of the Arctic Cold.

name: Eternal
description: Eternal is a stylized combat action RPG, where you fight your way through a fantasy landscape using a variety of weapons, shields, consumables and spells

name: Eternal Kingdom Battle Peak
description: A "Japanese" MMORPG featuring renowned creators such as Yoshitaka Amano! Travel with your allies through vast fields where weather changes and dungeons where your role is crucial!! PVP is also possible on the field! Establish a legion and join a "Siege" where up to 200 players battle!!

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Renault Trucks T Tuning Pack
description: The amount of love and effort that some drivers are willing to devote to their vehicles is unbelievable. Tons of chrome, expensive hand-made parts, lights, and paints - they turn a regular truck into a work of art! Get this DLC yourself, and trick up your Renault Trucks T in Euro Truck Simulator 2!

name: Fable of Sand Paws
description: Sand Paw is an adventurous cat who is looking for treasures! Explore the 3D dioramas, rotate the camera to find hidden locations, move blocks and platforms, solve puzzles, find and collect all the lost treasures!

name: Family Battle: Tag Arena
description: A huge fight between the members of the strongest family!? Pave the way to victory with just the two of you! The 2 vs 2 tag-team battle action begins here!

name: Famished Zombies: Decisive Extermination
description: Famished Zombies: Decisive Extermination is a Third-Person Survival Shooter based on Apocalypse days where Zombies are spawned each time when you finish a wave, the more waves you will play , the harder it will be. Play it in multiplayer mode to compete with others players.

name: Farming Simulator 22: AGI Pack
description: Get new equipment and facilities by AGI. Included in the free pack are augers, belt conveyors, grain storage bins and a top-tier seed treater.

name: Farmland Realm
description: The little farm is waiting for you to turn into a Farmland Realm!

name: Find the Cats
description: Cat Lady has lost all of her cats! Please find them for her. This is a short and easy, kid-friendly 3D hidden object game with over a hundred cats to find, spread over several areas.

name: Option Tuning Car Battle
description:
First of the Tuning Car Battle series of games for the original Playstation only released in Japan.
It's an urban driving/racing game which gives the option to upgrade the cars, the more races you win the more upgrades you get.

name: Option Tuning Car Battle 2
description:
Second game in the japan-exclusive racing/driving series Option Tunin Car Battle.
Unlike the first and third entries, this one was published by Jaleco.

name: The Lovely Estate
description: Second-Person Analog Comedy Horror Mystery in which three crazy NPCs describe the bizarre actions of your crazier intruder. You're here to get someone. They're here to breathe until they can't anymore. Mind the fumes.

name: Dokingan
description: A vertical shoot-em-up by GOTYO.

name: Hayate no Gotoku! Nightmare Paradise
description: Hayate no Gotoku! Nightmare Paradise is an Adventure game, developed by HuneX and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Slotter Up Core 3: Doronjo ni Omakase!
description: Slot machine game based on Bandai's Yattaman franchise. Featuring the character Doronjo from the show, among others.

name: Hayate no Gotoku! CardBattlers
description: The player needs to collect cards of many characters from the Hayate no Gotoku! series, level up the character cards and do battle to gain ranks. Cards and items can be found during gameplay of the story, gashapon slot machine, trade, or participate in the events. The game uses a micro transaction payment model to allow the player who paid cash to gain an advantage over the free player.

name: Steiiaria
description: Steiiaria - Endless space lo-fi adventure for all lovers of puzzles and fun! Mahjong, space and planets come together to give you the ultimate gameplay and music enjoyment in this game.

name: Psycho-Jirai In Love
description: A simulation of an outcast romance!

name: The Redress of Mira
description: With a variety of gameplay mechanics, venture through Mira's fantasy world filled with atmosphere and adventure, and pursue her inner peace.

name: Hacker Man
description: Joe, an experienced programmer at a reputable technology company, is fired by a director of the company, after having a romantic relationship with the director's wife. Very angry about the situation, Joe starts studying hacking, to get revenge for his firing.

name: PocketCiv
description: A solitaire civilization tabletop game. Plan your moves. Build your empire. Expand your civilization. Try to survive.

name: The Space-Eating Croc
description:
The Space-Eating Croc is a mystery adventure game influenced by classic horror RPG Maker games. Inspect your surroundings to find clues, and solve puzzles to progress.

Explore the mysterious hotel by controlling a mysterious man and a suspicious hotelier. Face the dark truth hidden deep inside the metaphorical spaces within the hotel, and find the monster hidden in between the rifts of space.

name: Midnight Renegade: Recollections
description: A Victorian 2D action platformer where you shoot and slash through grunts until you reach their boss, the Chief Constable.

name: Slotter UP Core 4
description: Slotter UP Core 4: Don-chan Gekiuchi! Jissen Pachi-Slot Ore Izuma is a pachislot simulation game based on a manga.

name: Ranchlife
description: There are a lot of farming simulations. But Ranchlife stands out with special features. A day/night system has been implemented to provide additional realism. Grow seeds, harvest vegetables and sell them at your own stall in town.

name: Norgame
description: Help the moon girl defeat the ancient monster that stole the sun. The action in a fabulous adventure puzzle game takes place in the scenery of the polar cities of Norilsk and Dudinka under the mysterious light of the Aurora borealis.

name: Roast Together
description: A casual game that relies on your drag-and-drop hand speed and simple strategic decisions.

name: Goddess of Card War 2: DLC-2
description: A new card character can be purchased in the shop: Manli Skill: Eliminate Deal 1.5 times damage to a single enemy. If the enemy's HP is lower than 30%, kill it directly.

name: Lone Ruin
description: Venture into an old, magical ruin to seek an ancient power in this highly replayable, top-down, roguelike twin-stick shooter. Combine and optimise your spells to defeat twisted monstrosities and dive deeper into the Lone Ruin.
